form submissions.

- Added new hooks: useTitularesEnergia, useUnidadesConsumidoras, etc.
- Created migration documentation and archive of legacy code

This ensures all CRUD operations work correctly with the Supabase
backend and prevents runtime errors from field name mismatches.
